name: Portland General Electric Company
description: Portland General Electric Company (PGE) is a publicly traded utility company that provides electricity to approximately 900,000 customers in Oregon. Founded in 1888, PGE has a long history of delivering reliable and affordable energy while prioritizing sustainability and environmental stewardship. The company operates a diverse portfolio of energy resources, including hydroelectric, natural gas, wind, and solar power, with a strong commitment to reducing carbon emissions. PGE aims to transition to a cleaner energy future by promoting renewable energy sources and enhancing energy efficiency programs for its customers. As part of its sustainability efforts, PGE has set ambitious goals to achieve a significant reduction in greenhouse gas emissions by 2030 and to supply 100% of its retail electricity sales with renewable resources by 2040. PGE also engages with local communities, offering programs to support low-income customers and invest in local energy projects. The company's mission reflects its dedication to not only providing power but also contributing positively to the communities it serves and the environment.
